<img src="images/spaghetti.jpg" class="thumb" width='100px' height=auto/>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(document).ready(function(){
	$(".thumb").click(function() {
		var dir = $(this).attr("src");
		$('#image').hide();
		$('#image').fadeIn('fast');
		$('#image').attr("src",dir);
	});
});
</script>
